subject: Portable amp'ed speakers! New tape.
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, Finally found some nice speakers: Craig CMA3000, white, that fold up w/4 "AA" batteries +plugin that goes into the RS 12-469 earphone jack. $16.00 at CVS Pharmacy. Works SOoooo much better than what I had plugged in! Also, tried a different type of tape; was using Maxwell XL II 90, Memorex DB 60, TDK D 90 type I, and now have TDK SA 90 High Bias type II.  This last one seems to work better. Recorded some clear "voices" + one that said, "I love you, MoM!" Don't know who that was! Hmmm?! Also, tried to contact John Lennon and it seemed as though he got annoyed at another entity blocking him, one even said, "Take your time." as I heard him say, "Jam it!!"  I wonder IF this is something he said while alive on Earth???  Wild stuff! 8-)      =Judy=
